name: Discovery #Mindblown
description: Ever wondered how machines work? Do you think dinosaurs are cool? Arent you curious of what else we can find in the outer space? Find the answers and expand your knowledge in just 5 minutes a day on Discovery #MINDBLOWN!  DAILY BOOST Watch informative videos, read daily fun fact, and play fun mini games with 5 topics to choose from: Animals & Dinos, Space & Planets, Humans, Machines & Robotics, and Our Earth!  AR VIEWER Enjoy interactive learning with realistic 3D visualization using augmented reality technology. Visit www.discoverymindblown.com for further information about the AR products availability and purchasing.  REWARDS Watch the videos, play the mini games, and enjoy the augmented reality features every day to earn coin rewards. Trade the coins with various STEM toys discount vouchers!  This app is compatible with Android 7 and up.  For further inquiries and assistance, please visit www.discoverymindblown.com
